Package.Name: Engines by Ed76na & Apa6ecka
Package.InternalNotes: (no original files by WG as template)
Package.Description:
With Sound Event Injector; 
- great tool for modding sounds 
- no patches for the Events are needed 

No PYmods_BanksLoader - only Patches to engine_config.xml

Usable with WWIIHWA (no Bankloader - Patches used)
- Sound Event Injector is compatible with WWIIHWA
Package.UpdateComment: 1.2.0 = 1.1.0; 1.1.0.0: Soundbanks to Wwise 2017.2.5, new Soundbanks

Package.UpdateComment:
V. 2.18 Added FV/T95 custom sounds
Fixed german HL234 engine

V. 2.16 Fixed scripts for xmas style
Fixed Panther turbo engine sound
Fixed missing french engine sounds

V.2.15: Added engine sounds for some american tanks
V.2.14: Added support for Super Hellcat

V. 2.10 Patchnote Compatibility with 1.6.0.2
Fixed leopard engine sound
Fixed T-116 gun sound
Added 64bit memory profile

Package.Name: NOTES: AGQJ Engines by Fedor Saveliev (SoundEventInjector)
Package.InternalNotes:
0. Soundinjektor is a great tool for modding sounds - no Patches are needed - updating gets much easier
1. Problem: Working alone as intended check replays
2. Problem: Soundinjektor is incompatible with WWIIHWA (WOT-Circle -- restart->crash->restart->crash....)
3. Dont have Ideas/ muse / moods for fixing now -123gauss

- updating get much easier & faster

Package.Name: GnomeFather’s HRMOD Gun Sounds (reworked by Zorgane) v{version}
Package.InternalNotes:
These are now wotmods for conflicting reasons.

own soundbanks by Zorgane:
audioww\Zorg_Guns_Engines.bnk
audioww\Zorg_Guns_Engines.pck

moded scripts
scripts\item_defs\vehicles
Package.Description:
This mod alters the sounds via the tanks xml's. This makes the mod break every patch. Expect some time for updates. Use Wrath of the Gods gun sounds, or Shimada if you want something that doesnt break every patch.

Dont forget : I (Zorgane) need reviews ! - use devolper website to do this please
Package.UpdateComment:
V. 2.18 Added FV/T95 custom sounds
Fixed german HL234 engine

V. 2.16 Fixed scripts for xmas style
Fixed Panther turbo engine sound
Fixed missing french engine sounds

V.2.15: Added engine sounds for some american tanks
V.2.14: Added support for Super Hellcat

V. 2.10 Patchnote Compatibility with 1.6.0.2
Fixed leopard engine sound
Fixed T-116 gun sound
Added 64bit memory profile

Package.Name: Company of Heroes
Package.InternalNotes: Removed ekspont_load.wotmod & LobbyApi.wotmod
Package.Description:
Siegfried by Strategic_Music+Andre_V_german
Note for youtube: Just wait ca. 20 seconds (russian language over)
Crew Sound Steel Foxes by Strategic Music and Andre_V
-provides alternative voice reactions from the tank crew. 
-More than 750 phrases for 45 different in-game situations.
-gives you a new gaming experience
-new emotions, atmosphere and some humor

The mod team:
Dmitry Kuzmenko – original idea, voice direction, script writing
Sergey Eybog - Technical director - Sergey Eybog
Erich Muff, Manuel Haefele - german Voice
Andrew Burmistrov, Savva Dudin, Stan Polesko, Ekaterina Kuzmenko - Sound editors
Olga Nigmatulina - Artist

Package.Name: NOTES: Sounds Music by Andre_V
Package.InternalNotes:
The_IzeBerg _ modssettingsapi _ mod_modsettingsexample.py — Bitbucket
https://bitbucket.org/The_IzeBerg/modssettingsapi/src/master/mod_modsettingsexample.py?fileviewer=file-view-default

background:
http://wiki.wargaming.net/ru/ModsettingsAPI

2019-05-17: Show: ALL versions
https://wgmods.net/search/?owner=138375
Package.Description:
2020-03-17

Complete rework

- These mods now are in res_mods. This is required of all audio mods
- The scripts are now a dependency "Dependency_Music_AndreV_Scripts"
- When updating, extract > extract wotmod > update this category only with the "audioww" folders from the wotmod > update the Dependency with the scripts folder IN A WOTMOD (this is required for it to work). 
- When updating the Dependency, check the internal notes on that package.

Package.Description:
Hard Rock Attack for WoT with more than 190 tracks.

Here is an incomplete list of tracks that sound in this fashion:
-Music in action: Saliva, PopEvil, Marauder, Shakra, BonJovi, Negative, Sabaton, Dharmata, Marrok, Avenger, Saidian, Sister, Tremonti, Striker, UDO, Wolf, Sturm Und Drang, Motley Crue, Rage, Crashdiet, Conquest, House Of Lords, Shylock, Soulhealer, Death Angel, Crematory, Ibridoma.
-Music in the hangar: Accept, Allen, Axxis, Papa Roach, WASP, Scorpions, Hedley, Weezer, Noctura, Skylark, Noctura.
-Music when downloading maps: Avenged Sevenfold, Helloween, Mark Knopfler, Def Leppard, Dream Theater, Emppu Vuorinen.

Package.Name: Epic Mega Music Collection by jakis_nick
Package.InternalNotes: PATCH NEEDED: For res\audioww\Init.bnk \nNo Patches needed: music_interactive.pck & loginscreen.bnk & utility.bnk (original files as template)
Package.Description:
EMMC:Epic Mega Music Collection by jakis_nick 
+ made with new project 1.2 from WG: There is a music on every map
+ contains 559 (2019-12-10) tracks of trailer music, such bands as:
-Audiomachine, 
-Battle X Music, 
-Colossal Trailer Music, 
-Epic North, 
-Ninja Tracks.

The tracks were sorted so that they would not be repeated in different events.

=> loginscreen - 10 tracks
=> hangar - 9 tracks
+ total tracks number (10.12.2019) is 559!

+Changed playlist sorting

+ added one new album with 12 tracks:
=> battle - 6 tracks
=> loginscreen - 2 tracks

Package.Description:
This MOD is released by Socialist music promotion committee

This mod includes
- Login screen music
- Battle music
- Battle result music
Includes music from Girls und panzer der film too.

-No Hangar music. Because of the technical shortage of technicians.
-No demo, because I can’t record video.

Package.Name: Hiroyuki Sawano's Epic Anime Music
Package.InternalNotes:
res\audioww\music_interactive.bnk
res\audioww\music_interactive.pck
 (original files by WG as template =>No Patches needed)
Package.Description:
Hiroyuki Sawano is a Japanese composer and musician best known for his work on many anime, TV series, and movies.

In this mod you will be able to enjoy his epic soundtracks while playing tanks !
Soundtracks are chosen from famous animes such as Attack On Titan, Re:Creators, Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn, Aldnoah.Zero, etc.

Music in following places will be replaced:
Hanger, Battle, Loading screen, Win/Lose/Draw screen

============================================================

Sawano’s work has been made into wot mod since 2013 and I had a lot of good experiences while using it, but I’m so sad that the original mod maker is no longer active. So I decide to make this mod and bring those experiences back to players!

============================================================

Package.Name: Soundtracks Old Memories by DrWeb7_1
Package.Description: here you can choose music from different movies

Package.Name: Old Memories - Music in Battle
Package.UpdateComment:
CHANGELOGS
Version 6.0
[EN] - Reworked Random Battles music playlist - Reworked maximum music volume values - Other minor fixes

Version 5.0
[EN] Implemented support for new Frontline map - Kraftwerk Changed some logic code in random battles to prevent tracks overlaying Created seamless transitions between battle's phase (intensive/relaxed) in random battles Reworked Frontline battle music playlistsVersion 4.0
Version 3.0
[EN] Created seamless transitions between tracks which happen if situation changes too fast Created basic compatibility with "Frontline" event Added soundtracks from patch 0.7.0 Deleted winter maps category - the soundtrack was an alternate to Mountain Pass "Mannerheim Line" and "Glacier" now are village maps with European stylistics Klondike is moved to American maps category Erlenberg is moved to European city-styled maps category
Version 2.0
[EN] Implemented "Ghost Town" map support Added "We will not surrender" music track to Russian-styled city maps playlist Mod is now based on Wwise "Interactive Music" mechanics providing smooth transitions between tracks without losing the rhythm. In sniper mode low-frequency sounds are now filtered, not high-frequency ones
